title: Milvus RAG with functionality to delete files from vector DB and upload files of all major file types (.pdf, .doc, .docx, .csv, .txt)
author: Aditya Santhosh, Bhavishya Pandit
description:
This asset is wrapped using fast api and allows functionality for the following:
1. Uploading files: User can upload file of any of the major file types. Supported extensions are: .pdf, .doc, .docx, .csv, .txt
2. Answer question: The most relevant chunks from milvus are used to answer the question. The output response json also contains the filename that was used to answer the question as well as a base64 encoded string of the page that was used for answering. This base64 string can easily be decoded to display the page in frontend
3. Delete data: User can delete all records associated with a filename from milvus db
